column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I looked at him and asked for the check (one friend managed to order a beer). Yes I'm female
column2: but I do enjoy whiskey and own over 100 bottles myself and know the differences between bourbon
column10: etc. We Left and none of us have been back 8 months later. Food is subpar and since their initial opening (yes i was there on your opening day) prices have continually increased for very average $20-$30 bottles of bourbon in particular. I'm actually offended by how much they have marked up the prices- they are essentially robbing you. Liked this place initially and went often but after the most recent visit
column11: it will always be a hard pass.
